item.title: Helen add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "In the world according to her father, Jenny Garp knew, we must have energy. Her famous grandmother, Jenny Fields, once thought of us as Externals, Vital Organs, Absentees, and Goners. But in the world according to Garp, we are all terminal cases." -- John Irving

item.title: Helen add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "Life," Garp wrote, "is sadly not structured like a good old-fashioned novel. Instead an end occurs when those who are meant to peter out have petered out. All that is left is memory. But even a nihilist has memory." -- John Irving

item.title: Helen add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "don't worry - so what if there is no life after death? There is life after Garp, believe me." -- John Irving
